item.title: Sundeep Sharma Live!
item.description: This show is a laughter ride. Sundeep keeps shuffling between Mumbai and Delhi, and its after a long time that hes coming to Gujarat for a show. Completely focused on his life, his stand-up is a mix of chunks from his life and what he observes around all dripping with sarcasm. This, coupled with his ability to mimic voices and the art of impersonating the known political and apolitical characters, makes him a truly unique act to watch.

item.title: Earthcon Expo
item.description: The Earthcon Expo provides the attendees with the opportunity to learn latest trends and engage with manufacturers and suppliers directly, connect with construction professionals from exhibitors, distributors to key buyers and industry figures, gain access to local market dynamics, investors, and niche providers that enhance product offerings, and much more. Timings 09:00 AM-06:00 PM (expected)
